## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description | Type                          | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------- | ----------------------------- | ----------- |
| `border` | `border`  | 下边框, 0则不显示  | `number`                      | `1`         |
| `color`  | `color`   | 线条颜色        | `string`                      | `'#f5f5f5'` |
| `short`  | `short`   | 短线条方向       | `"both" \| "left" \| "right"` | `undefined` |
